verses.verse: An <S%H5002>oracle<s%> is <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> about the <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> "There is no <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> before his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>"
For he <S%H2505>flatters<s%> himself in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> too much to <S%H4672>detect<s%> and hate his <S%H8130>sin.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit.<s%> He has <S%H2308>ceased<s%> to be <S%H7919>wise<s%> and to do <S%H3190>good.<s%>
He <S%H2803>plots<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed.<s%> He <S%H3320>sets<s%> himself in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good.<s%> He <S%H3988>doesn't<s%> abhor <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> Your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> reaches to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

Your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is like the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of <S%H410>God.<s%> Your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are like a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H3467>preserve<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal.<s%>

How <S%H3368>precious<s%> is your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H430>God!<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

They shall be abundantly <S%H7301>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H1880>abundance<s%> of your <S%H1004>house.<s%> You will make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of your <S%H5730>pleasures.<s%>
For with you is the <S%H4726>spring<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%> In your <S%H216>light<s%> shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
Oh <S%H4900>continue<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to those who <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6666>you,<s%> your righteousness to the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H7272>Don't<s%> let the foot of <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H3027>me.<s%> Don't let the hand of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> drive me <S%H5110>away.<s%>
There the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen.<s%> They are thrust <S%H1760>down,<s%> and shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise.<s%>
